chartData.name: Fact 1
chartData.description: Here are 5 interesting facts with stats about relationships:

chartData.name: Fact 2
chartData.description: 1. 88% of Americans marry for love, making it the most common reason for getting married[1][4].

chartData.name: Fact 3
chartData.description: 2. About 19% of teenagers are currently involved in romantic relationships[1][2].

chartData.name: Fact 4
chartData.description: 3. Men are 5% more confident that they are in love with their partner compared to women. Specifically, 62% of men are sure they are in love with their partner, compared to 57% of women[1][2].

chartData.name: Fact 5
chartData.description: 4. Long-distance relationships often have more satisfaction and trust than geographically close relationships, contrary to popular belief[1].

chartData.name: Fact 6
chartData.description: 5. Laughter plays an important role in relationships. Studies have found that shared laughter between partners is associated with higher relationship quality, social support, and closeness[1][2].
